entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
